step.cmd: Click the Create Project button in the Workspace Actions pane.
step.stepresult: A text field will appear in which you can enter a project name.

step.cmd: If you do not wish to create a project at this time, click Cancel create new project/X or press ESC. Otherwise, type a name for your project and click the Create new project in workspace/+ button or press Enter.
step.stepresult: This action will save the project in your current workspace folder and open it in the Project Manager.
